Rulings.Base:
1. Even if this card is not destroyed by battle, damage calculation is still conducted.
2. If this card would be destroyed as a result of battle you can still activate the effect to Special Summon a Gemini monster.
3. You cannot activate the effect to Special Summon if you have no Gemini monsters in your Deck.
4. The effect to Special Summon 1 Gemini monster activates at the same time as effects that trigger when damage is dealt, such as "Airknight Parshath".
